create_page.description: Creates a new Qwilr page from saved blocks or template.

props.name: templateId
props.description: ID of the template to use for the page

props.name: name
props.description: Title of the page, visible as the browser page title

props.name: published
props.description: Whether the page is publicly available; false means the page will be in Draft status

props.name: ownerId
props.description: ID of the user that should own the page. If not specified, the owner of the access token will be the owner of the page.

props.name: tags
props.description: The tags for your page. Tags are case-sensitive.

props.name: metadata
props.description: Data you provide, that will be returned as part of all Webhooks.

props.name: substitutions
props.description: Mapping of token API reference keys to substitution values used throughout the page.

props.name: acceptSettings
props.description: Configures settings for the accept block in the template being used. Only relevant if you have an accept block.

page_accepted.description: Triggers when a Qwilr page is accepted

page_first_viewed.description: Triggers when a Qwilr page is viewed for the first time

page_partially_accepted.description: Triggers when a Qwilr page is partially accepted

page_preview_accepted.description: Triggers when a Qwilr page preview is accepted

page_revived_live.description: Triggers when a Qwilr page is revived to live status

page_set_live.description: Triggers when a Qwilr page is set to live

page_viewed.description: Triggers when a Qwilr page is viewed
